name: Reorder Series
description: Moves a number within a series up or down one index position and rearranges the series accordingly.
author: Your Name <your@email.com>

params.name: direction
params.hint: Enter 'up' to move the number up (decrease index) or 'down' to move it down (increase index).

result.description: The rearranged series of numbers as a string.
